import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Header.css"; function Header() { const [isAccountHovered, setIsAccountHovered] = useState(false); return ( <>
Shop Blog About Us Rewards Contact
setIsAccountHovered(true)} onMouseLeave={() => setIsAccountHovered(false)} > Account {isAccountHovered && (
Log in Register
)}
Cart (0)
); } export default Header;
